title: Flashback
description: Sarah is only thirteen but she has a unique gene that allows her to remember everything that happened to her ancestor thousands of years ago. A random DNA swab brings her to the attention of a secretive old man. His company offers her a chance for a better life, but unknown to her, they want to harvest her memories for profit. Increasingly intrusive and brutal experiments culminate in a shocking finale that reveals Sarah is now in a fight that may cost her every thought she has ever had.The Hunger Games meets The Magicians in this new adult debut novel by TR Davis. Get your copy today!---*Some scenes contain incidents of violence and sexual assault written from a character perspective. While historically accurate, some teens may find these scenes upsetting. They are descriptive but not overly graphic in nature, but it is for this reason that this is not appropriate for the young adult audience.
author: T.R. Davis
